message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement. My initial offer for the product is $1150000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1050000 for the product.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, and I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1075000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I think I can do better than that. I'll offer $1030000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. I propose a counteroffer of $1060000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1040000, but I'm hoping we can get even closer to my target. I'll offer $1045000 is too high, I'll offer $1040000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've considered your proposal and am willing to negotiate further. I propose a counteroffer of $1055000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. I'll offer $1050000 for the product.
